result.name: 3d-gia-model-output-van-der-wal-et-al-2015-nerc-grant-ne-k009958-1
result.notes: Numerical model predictions of present-day solid Earth deformation and gravity field change due to ongoing glacial isostatic adjustment processes. Model accounts for 3D spatial variations in Earth rheology using a finite element approach.
